title: jaanaki ramaNa
sahitya:
jAnakI ramaNa dasharatha nandana sarvarIsha vadana harE rAma (jAnakI)







anupallavi







dIna vatsala dayA jaladhE (rAma) vara dAna shIla kOdaNDapANE (jAnakI)







caraNam







kaushikamakha samrakSana kara gautamakAnta nija rUpavara



mahita mahEshvara cApa dalLanakara maithila tanaya kara mAlAdhara



(jAnakI)
